message: Whether it’s a five-star hotel or a small motel just off the interstate, the anonymity and privacy offered by hotels and the frequent turnover of their clientele make them attractive to traffickers who favor changing location frequently to evade law enforcement.

data.description: Hoteliers across the country are taking proactive measures to focus on helping some of the most vulnerable people in their communities and improving the safety and security of their properties. They are welcoming a new role in shining a light on the dark world of human trafficking.
data.title: In the Fight to Prevent Human Trafficking, Hoteliers Play a  Crucial Role
